text: (Napiye) katarkaraiyilirunta ur (makkalaip) parri nir avarkalaik ketpiraka. (Oyvu nalakiya) canikkilamaiyanru (min vettaiyatak kutatenru tatukkappattiruntum) avarkal varampu miri (min vettaiyati)k kontiruntarkal. Enenral, canikkilamaiyanru (akkatalil ulla) minkal avarkal mun vantu (nir mattattirkut) talaikalai nittik kontiruntana. Canikkilamaiyallata nalkalil avarkalitam avai varuvatillai. Avarkal pavam ceytu kontiruntatan karanamaka avarkalai ivvaru (mikak katinamana) cotanaikku ullakkinom
